Specifically , metabolic syndrome diagnose documented 3 follow 5 characteristic present : abdominal obesity , give waist circumference men > 102 cm , woman > 88 cm triglyceride > 150 mg/dL HDL cholesterol < 40 mg/dL men , < 50 mg/dL woman blood pressure > 130/85 mm Hg fast glucose > 100 mg/dL 1 .
